Project1.name: Personal Portfolio
Project1.details: This is my portfolio site created after learning the basics of React.

Project2.name: Aayush Store
Project2.details: Aayush Store is the second project I developed after learning React. It's an e-commerce platform where users can browse and purchase various products

project3.name: Image Search
project3.details: This is my third project, called Image Search. It allows users to search for images and view them in a gallery-style layout.

project4.name: Hamro Teacher
project4.details: Hamro Teacher is a project developed during Sagarmatha Hacks. It aims to act as the bridge between educational institutions and students.

project5.name: BookStore (MERN)
project5.details: BookStore is a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) project. It allows users to register, delete, view books online.
